tool_description: Validates and reconciles classification results from multiple tools, resolving conflicts and ensuring consistency across different classification dimensions.

service_results.description: Array of service area mapping results

issue_results.description: Array of issue type detection results

confidence_scores.description: Array of confidence scores for each classification set

validation_rules.description: Custom validation rules for resolving classification conflicts

conflict_resolution.description: Method for resolving conflicts: confidence_based, rule_based, or manual_review

consistency_threshold.description: Minimum consistency score required for validation (0.1-1.0)

enable_cross_validation.description: Whether to perform cross-validation between classification types

output_format.description: Output format: structured, flat, or hierarchical

error_messages: Mismatched result arrays: All classification result arrays must have the same length.
Invalid confidence scores: All confidence scores must be between 0 and 1.
Unsupported conflict resolution method: Use confidence_based, rule_based, or manual_review.
Invalid consistency threshold: Value must be between 0.1 and 1.0.
Unsupported output format: Use structured, flat, or hierarchical.
Validation failed: Unable to validate and reconcile classification results.
usage: Provide all classification result arrays and confidence_scores. Configure validation_rules, conflict_resolution, consistency_threshold, enable_cross_validation, and output_format as needed. Returns validated and reconciled classifications.

conflict_count.description: Number of conflicts identified and resolved

consistency_score.description: Overall consistency score across all classifications
